document_data.name: Mask of the Beast
document_data.mainbody: A '''''mask of the beast''''' was a magical [[mask (object)|mask]] that allowed the wearer to better interact with [[beast]]s.
document_data.Description: ''Masks of the beast'' were shaped in the likeness of a beast's visage
document_data.Powers: The mask granted its wearer the benefits of the ''[[animal friendship]]'' spell up to three times a day. It then recharged its magic at every dawn.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Azaka Stormfang]], a [[weretiger]] who worked as a guide in [[Port Nyanzaru]] in the late 15th century [[DR]].
